instruction: I'm a huge movie fan and have kept a record of all the movies I've watched. I'm curious to find out if there are any films released before 2024 from the IMDB Top 30 list that I haven't seen yet. Help me create another sheet 'unseen_movies' in the opened Excel. This sheet should share the same headers and sort the results according to IMDB rankings from high to low.

minimal: `CLICK` on the Chrome window of IMDB page
`CLICK` on the first movie title on the IMDB page
`CLICK` on 'Sheet2' or the '+' button to create a new sheet
`SWITCH` back to the LibreOffice Calc window
`REPEAT` steps for all 30 movies, adding each to the new sheet in LibreOffice Calc, in order.
`CLICK` on cell A1 on the new sheet
`DRAG` the fill handle of cell C1 down to apply the formula to all rows
`CLICK` on the new sheet's tab and rename it to 'unseen_movies'
`CLICK` on any cell in the data range
`SELECT` the column containing IMDB ranking (likely column A)
batched: `CLICK` on the first movie title on the IMDB page
`CLICK` on 'Sheet2' or the '+' button to create a new sheet
`SWITCH` back to the LibreOffice Calc window
`REPEAT` steps for all 30 movies, adding each to the new sheet in LibreOffice Calc, in order.
`CLICK` on cell A1 on the new sheet
`DRAG` the fill handle of cell C1 down to apply the formula to all rows
`CLICK` on the new sheet's tab and rename it to 'unseen_movies'
`CLICK` on any cell in the data range
`SELECT` the column containing IMDB ranking (likely column A)
